message.content:
cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.NE 

This paper is likely to belong to the arXiv CS sub-category of cs.CL (Computation and Language) as it focuses on training recurrent neural networks for structured prediction tasks such as machine translation and OCR. Additionally, the paper proposes a novel training algorithm inspired by the "learning to search" approach, which is commonly used in structured prediction tasks. 

The paper also involves machine learning techniques, which suggests that it could also belong to the cs.LG (Machine Learning) sub-category. 

Furthermore, the paper's focus on structured prediction tasks and leveraging global-local losses suggests that it could also belong to the cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) sub-category. 

The paper's use of OCR and machine translation tasks suggests that it could also belong to the cs.CV (Computer Vision) and cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing) sub-categories, respectively.
